name: the mannequin (bunger1)
description: This game is for the shitty horror game jam. I didn't have enough time to fully finish it, so it is a quick game that doesn't have a main menu or anything like that. When you finish the game there is the quit button so you will have to shut down the game. I hope yall have fun with it, its not the best but its still goofy its not scary but if i was able to get more time it would be. Have fun and please enjoy!
